title: Duo problem ive been getting
body:
So last season i ended up Gold V for solo Q and Plat V for Ranked team, so today me and my friends decided to try to premade ranked team, me a Gold V, a Plat 3 and a Plat 5 but when i try to invite them it says they are ineligible and when they invite me, it brings up the lobby for a split second and then it kicks me out saying something along the lines of you can only duo with players within one tier or something like that. My friends and i think the reason for this is because last season i got banned so i didnt get season rewards nor borders and they think the system recognise me as Silver or Bronze, idk if this is the real answer or a bug but i hope i get a solution asap. 
Thanks

TLDR; cant duo with friends apparently even though i was gold and they were plat last season

replies.body: bump, experiencing this aswell, so frustrating

I'm having the same issue. But it doesn't make sense because the user 'yb2016' was ranked 4 challenger in OCE and he got his rewards stripped due to a chat restriction yet his elo/mmr was not reset like ours?

I just wanted to premade 5 with my ranked team but we cant cause apparently im not within one tier when they are all plat and im the only former gold but i got banned, wish the riot devs would reply to this
